messages.author: Central Command
messages.body:
Enemy communication intercepted. Security level elevated.

A summary has been copied and printed to all communications consoles.

messages.author: Captain's Announcement
messages.body: Yo, Devil, If you wanna make a deal, Strike a deal with me! I'm an open minded person.

messages.author: Captain's Announcement
messages.body: Devil. If you reveal yourself, We probably won't murder ya! I'll even count you as a good boy!

messages.author: Captain's Announcement
messages.body: I have fixed chem i alert all personal to look for terorists
